p:
Superoxide dismutase (SOD) catalyzes the removal of superoxide free radicals (O 2 −) and safeguards the cells from harmful effects by the following reaction.
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ {20}_{2^{\hbox{-} }}+2\mathrm{H}\to {\mathrm{H}}_2{\mathrm{O}}_2+{\mathrm{O}}_2 $$\end{document}
20
2 ‐
+ 2 H →
H 2
O 2
+
O 2
